comment.realoadCounter: amount of blocks before retrying reload, default 1
comment.reloadChance: chance to successfully reload after trying, default 0
comment.reloadLoopAlways: always reload on a loop, default true
comment.boundBox: how much can the sprites go out of the screen. 0 - not at all, 1 - fully, default 1
comment.reboundOnRotate: should sprites rebound into bounds when rotated, defualt false
comment.default: 1, 0, true -> reload only on loop end or block end
